resources.string: Read-Me: This is the read-me for the app. Made with Android Studio for a project, three GUI needed for the project. Very simple practice. Have fun.
Add A New Pick Up Line

Instructions:

Note: For best results,
keep this app on your homepage
so it is easily accessed.

Use this add to store and retrieve
pickup lines you like.

To Add a pickup line,
press the Add A Pick Up Line button
on the bottom of the screen.
This will take to a new page.
In the textfield at the top of the page,
enter your pick up line.
Note: Make sure you hit
the Add button to save to the app.

To Delete: Type in the exact
pickup line you want to delete,
and hit the Delete button.

Hello World! Welcome to my first Android application using SQLite Databases.
This app exists so you can keep your best pickuplines on hand and access them quickly and easily.
****
android {
 compileSdkVersion 22
 buildToolsVersion "22.0.1" defaultConfig {
 minSdkVersion 15
 targetSdkVersion 22
 versionCode 1
 versionName "1.0"}
 ****
 This app is built with Lollipop 22, and was made with Android Studio 2.2.3, build date 20.02.2017 by E. Gutmanis.
Enjoy!
Button: Add New Pick Up Line
Click on this button to view all your saved pickuplines.
Click on this button to add a new pickupline to your database. It will take you to a new page. Read the instructions in the next section for full instructions.

1. Enter your pickupline in pickupline field.
2. Enter your genre in genre field.
3. IGNORE id field. This is ONLY for UPDATING
4. Click Add Data.
5. To view the added pickupline, click on View All
1. Click on View All. This will show all your added data.

Note: Before updating an existing pickupline entry, take note of its ID number. To find the ID number, view database and locate the ID number for your chosen pickupline entry.
 1. Enter the pickupline you want to update and make the changes your changes. Any changes made will overwrite your existing data, and old data cannot be retrieved.
2. Enter the pickupline's id number.
3. Click Update.
4.To view changes, click on View All. 
Example: User saved "Is your name Daniel? Because damn" and its genre "Lame", but wants to change "damn" to capital letters and add an exclamation mark. User also wants to change genre to "Funny". User simply enters the desired pickupline with changes made, "Is your name Daniel? Because DAMN"\! into the pickupline field, and enters "Funny" into the genre field. User enters the id number into id field, and clicks Update.
Enter only the ID of the pickupline you want to delete, and Click Delete.
ID: for Updating and Deleting ONLY
